value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Describe core Azure architectural components
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Subscriptions, Management Groups, Resource Groups, Resource Manager, Azure Regions, and Availability zones.

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Choose the right Azure services by examining SLAs and service lifecycle
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) and how they can impact your application design decisions. Also see how to access preview services and learn how they impact your planning.

value.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage
value.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and code to connect it to Azure Storage.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
value.excerpt: Learn about the virtual private network (VPN) gateway options in Azure and typical scenarios for using a VPN. Create and test VPNs to securely connect sites to Azure.

value.title: Design your migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

value.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Use Visual Studio together with a test framework to create, deploy, and test an Azure Function.

value.title: Explore concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore concepts of data analytics

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Use Azure Active Directory to you secure your internal, external, and customer identities.

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
value.excerpt: Learn about SRE, an engineering discipline that helps you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

value.title: Strengthen authentication (conditional access) with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about modern authentication and the security benefits it provides to your organization, such as enabling multi-factor authentication and a passwordless environment.

value.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
value.excerpt: Find out what makes Azure SQL Database a good choice for your relational database, how to create the database from the portal and connect with Azure Cloud Shell.

value.title: Secure your application by using OpenID Connect and Azure AD
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to enable users to authenticate in multiple systems by using their Azure AD identities.

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Learn how to troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer.

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for

value.excerpt: UPDATED TO FULL SCREEN  The Azure Portal allows you to create and manage storage accounts and upload a blob. value.title: How to create an Azure SQL database | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create an Azure SQL Database in the Azure Portal and how you can be more productive in Azure.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: Improve security with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sarah Young joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Sentinel, which is a scalable, cloud-native, security information event management (SIEM) and security orchestration automated response (SOAR) solution. Azure Sentinel delivers intelligent security analytics and threat intelligence across the enterprise,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oiWInLYvnUk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Serverless containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this episode, Azure CTO Mark Russinovich joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can use Azure Container Instances (ACI) to host a containerized application. Mark deploys an image processing container in three ways: as a standalone ACI container, as part of a Logic Apps workflow, and as the backend
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7G_oDLON7Us" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
